events.name: Pittsburgh Panthers at Michigan State Spartans

headlines.description: — Michigan State capped its turnaround from from a two-win season with a fourth-quarter comeback in the Peach Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: Thorne leads No. 11 Spartans past No. 13 Pitt in Peach Bowl

video.headline: Michigan State seals the win with the 78-yard pick-six

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF One-Play (Michigan State seals the win with the 78-yard pick-six) 2021/12/30

events.name: North Carolina Tar Heels at South Carolina Gamecocks

headlines.description: — Purdue came into the Music City Bowl short-handed and banged-up, particularly at wide receiver.
headlines.shortLinkText: Purdue outlasts Tennessee 48-45 in OT in Music City Bowl

video.headline: Controversial fourth-down stop sets up Purdue's Music City Bowl win

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Purdue's 4th-down stop sets up OT winner) 2021/12/30 ESHEET

events.name: Wisconsin Badgers at Arizona State Sun Devils

headlines.description: — Braelon Allen thought his week in Las Vegas was rather uneventful.
headlines.shortLinkText: Allen, Wisconsin hold off Arizona State in Las Vegas Bowl

video.headline: Wisconsin takes home the Las Vegas Bowl over Arizona State

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Wisconsin takes home the Las Vegas Bowl over Arizona State) 2021/12/30 ESHEET SOTFULL
